name: Weedo X40
pre_gcode: ; PLEASE CHECK: T{initial_extruder_nr} S ; Selected start extruder
M73 P0 ; Set current print progress percentage
M301 H1 P15.53 I1.32 D45.75 ; PID left extruder with Weedo X40 coolingsystem
;M301 H1 P13.32 I0.98 D45.13 ; PID left extruder with X40 Community coolingsystem
M301 H1 P15.44 I1.29 D46.11 ; PID right extruder with Weedo X40 coolingsystem
;M301 H1 P13.32 I0.98 D45.13 ; PID right extruder with X40 Community coolingsystem
G1 X-47 F3000 ; Move left nozzle to parking position
G1 X351 F3000 ; Move right nozzle to parking position
M107 P0 ; Turn off left fan
M107 P1 ; Turn off right fan
; PLEASE CHECK: T{initial_extruder_nr} S ; Set start extruder
M190 S{bed_temp} ; Waiting for bed temperature
G1 E50 F100 ; Extrude in parking position
post_gcode: M104 S0 T0 ; Cool down left extruder
M104 S0 T1 ; Cool down right extruder
M107 P0 ; Turn off left fan
M107 P1 ; Turn off right fan
M73 P100 ; Set print progress to 100%
